original_text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there: and they came not for Jesus' sake only, but that they might see Lazarus also, whom he had raised from the dead.
korean_text: 유대인의 큰 무리가 예수께서 여기 계신 줄을 알고 오니 이는 예수만 보기 위함이 아니요 죽은 자 가운데서 살리신 나사로도 보려 함이러라

sentences.original_text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 많은 유대인 사람들이 그가 그곳에 있는 것을 알았습니다:

sentences.original_text: and they came not for Jesus' sake only,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 예수님만을 위해 온 것이 아니었습니다,

sentences.original_text: but that they might see Lazarus also,
whom he had raised from dead.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분이 죽은 자로부터 일으키신 분을 말입니다.
